description:
Jason just graduated from college and is looking for a job.

He says he's good at a lot of things, but really enjoys working on cars. He's a very physical person. He asked us if we cared that he had a Prince Albert piercing. We said we didn't, of course. He told us that his women like it a lot... he said he's given some very pleasurable experiences to some lucky ladies many times with it.
title: Jason
